meanings.definition: A whizbangs is a small, explosive missile that makes a whizzing or banging sound.
meanings.sent1: The soldier launched a whizbangs towards the enemy.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display included colorful whizbangs lighting up the sky.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as the toy whizbangs popped and crackled.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a burst of whizbangs.
meanings.sent5: The loud whizbangs startled the birds from their perches.

meanings.definition: Whizbangs can refer to something that is very impressive or exciting.
meanings.sent1: The magician's performance was full of whizbangs and surprises.
meanings.sent2: The new theme park ride was a whizbangs of a good time.
meanings.sent3: The movie's special effects were a whizbangs delight for the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her idea for the project was a real whizbangs that impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The grand finale of the concert was a whizbangs of music and lights.

meanings.definition: To whizbangs is to move quickly and noisily.
meanings.sent1: The kids whizbangs through the playground, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent2: The train whizbangs past the fields, leaving a trail of smoke.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel whizbangs up the tree, trying to escape the dog.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to whizbangs by as they enjoyed their day at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The car whizbangs down the road, its engine roaring loudly.

meanings.definition: Whizbangs can also be used as an exclamation to express excitement or surprise.
meanings.sent1: Whizbangs! I can't believe we won the game!
meanings.sent2: Whizbangs! That was an amazing magic trick!
meanings.sent3: Whizbangs! Look at the size of that ice cream cone!
meanings.sent4: Whizbangs! The surprise party was a total success!
meanings.sent5: Whizbangs! The fireworks display was truly spectacular!
